Text: My mouse won't go below at certain point on the bottom of the screen. I can't click the starting button nor the back button. Any Help?

It works, but has some issues.

Changing resolution or entering window mode and back again can eliminate the cursor issue.

I found however, that the available resolutions will eventually allow only 640x480.

If your cursor get's stuck and you can't reach the bottom, change your resolution to something else and then change it back. 

Didn't see the 640x480 issue. I'm on 10.6.8
